title: Huge crowds gather in Israel calling for hostage deal and end to Gaza war
summary: Large crowds fill 'Hostages Square' in Tel Aviv to call for fighting to cease and the release of all remaining hostages by Hamas.

title: UK and EU at Zelenskyy’s side in Washington for meeting with Trump
summary: Emmanuel Macron, Friedrich Merz and others will aim to push back against ceding of Ukraine territory in ‘peace plan’ European leaders including Keir Starmer will join Volodymyr Zelenskyy at a White House meeting with Donald Trump on Monday in an extraordinary joint effort to push back on a US-backed plan that would allow Russia to take further Ukrainian territory . As well as the UK prime minister, the French president, Emmanuel Macron, Germany’s chancellor, Friedrich Merz, Italy’s PM, Giorgia Meloni, and the Finnish president, Alexander Stubb, will all accompany Zelenskyy in the Oval Office. Continue reading...

title: GPT-5 is supposed to be nicer now
summary: OpenAI announced late Friday that it’s updating its latest model to be “warmer and friendlier.”
